donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: Support regional food security through increased resilience at national and local levels, as well as improve awareness and understanding of the possible implications of climate variability and change on wheat and food security at the regional level. Actions that can be taken nationally and regionally to respond to the challenges will be identified as part of a consultative process that links to ongoing climate change adaptation initiatives in the region.

project_descr: Improving the Climate Resiliency of Kazakhstan Wheat and Central Asian Food Security
project_title: Climate Resiliency of Kaz Wheat and Central Asia securit
